name: Evgeniy Sychev
about: Hello! I am a QA Engineer with over 10 years of experience in testing web and mobile applications. I have extensive knowledge of manual testing, API testing, and quality assurance process management. I am eager to grow in the field of automated testing.

description: Performed manual testing of REST API services, ensuring high system quality;
Created and automated requests in Postman for 3 APIs with over 70 endpoints, which accelerated testing and reduced error rates;
Used JavaScript scripts in Postman to automate checks and increase test efficiency;
Identified defects using DevTools, Kibana, and server log analysis via command line, facilitating quick problem resolution;
Conducted end-to-end testing of critical business processes, including interactions with external integrations;
Worked actively with Charles Proxy and Postman's mock server to substitute data and test various integration scenarios.
Developed and led an authorâ€™s course on 'Software Testing' with a focus on practical application of modern technologies;

Developed and maintained a full-featured educational application for testing practice based on the PERN stack and small Python microservices. Integrated with RabbitMQ for asynchronous request handling and Redis for data caching and quick access.

experience.projects: SBOLPRO - Corporate application for Sberbank employees (iPad, web version)
description: Conducted testing of web and mobile applications using various test design techniques and exploratory testing (Technology stack on the project: Charles Proxy, Kibana, DevTools, Postman, RabbitMQ, Oracle DB);
Troubleshot issues during integration testing, which involved active log analysis and communication with other teams;
Managed the quality of a complex backend system with integration of over 10 internal systems;
Established the testing process from scratch: tool selection, test documentation development, test environment setup, and test planning;
Reduced regression testing time by 15% through test suite optimization.
experience.techStack: Charles Proxy, Kibana, DevTools, Postman, RabbitMQ, PostgreSQL
